00016 #include <ImfInputFile.h>
00017 #include <ImfOutputFile.h>
00018 #include <ImfChannelList.h>
00019 #include <ImfFrameBuffer.h>
00020 #include <half.h>
00021 #include "pbrt.h"
00022 #include "color.h"
00023 using namespace Imf;
00024 using namespace Imath;
00025 // EXR Function Definitions
00026 COREDLL Spectrum *ReadImage(const string &name, int *width, int *height) {
00027         try {
00028         InputFile file(name.c_str());
00029         Box2i dw = file.header().dataWindow();
00030         *width  = dw.max.x - dw.min.x + 1;
00031         *height = dw.max.y - dw.min.y + 1;
00032 
00033         half *rgb = new half[3 * *width * *height];
00034 
00035         FrameBuffer frameBuffer;
00036         frameBuffer.insert("R", Slice(HALF, (char *)rgb,
00037                 3*sizeof(half), *width * 3 * sizeof(half), 1, 1, 0.0));
00038         frameBuffer.insert("G", Slice(HALF, (char *)rgb+sizeof(half),
00039                 3*sizeof(half), *width * 3 * sizeof(half), 1, 1, 0.0));
00040         frameBuffer.insert("B", Slice(HALF, (char *)rgb+2*sizeof(half),
00041                 3*sizeof(half), *width * 3 * sizeof(half), 1, 1, 0.0));
00042 
00043         file.setFrameBuffer(frameBuffer);
00044         file.readPixels(dw.min.y, dw.max.y);
00045 
00046         Spectrum *ret = new Spectrum[*width * *height];
00047         // XXX should do real RGB -> Spectrum conversion here
00048         for (int i = 0; i < *width * *height; ++i) {
00049                 float c[3] = { rgb[3*i], rgb[3*i+1], rgb[3*i+2] };
00050                 ret[i] = Spectrum(c);
00051         }
00052         delete[] rgb;
00053         return ret;
00054         } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00055                 Error("Unable to read image file \"%s\": %s", name.c_str(),
00056                         e.what());
00057                 return NULL;
00058         }
00059 }
00060 
00061 COREDLL void WriteRGBAImage(const string &name, float *pixels,
00062                 float *alpha, int xRes, int yRes,
00063                 int totalXRes, int totalYRes,
00064                 int xOffset, int yOffset) {
00065         Header header(totalXRes, totalYRes);
00066         Box2i dataWindow(V2i(xOffset, yOffset), V2i(xOffset + xRes - 1, yOffset + yRes - 1));
00067         header.dataWindow() = dataWindow;
00068         header.channels().insert("R", Channel (HALF));
00069         header.channels().insert("G", Channel (HALF));
00070         header.channels().insert("B", Channel (HALF));
00071         header.channels().insert("A", Channel (HALF));
00072 
00073         half *hrgb = new half[3 * xRes * yRes];
00074         for (int i = 0; i < 3 * xRes * yRes; ++i)
00075                 hrgb[i] = pixels[i];
00076         half *ha = new half[xRes * yRes];
00077         for (int i = 0; i < xRes * yRes; ++i)
00078                 ha[i] = alpha[i];
00079 
00080         hrgb -= 3 * (xOffset + yOffset * xRes);
00081         ha -= (xOffset + yOffset * xRes);
00082 
00083         FrameBuffer fb;
00084         fb.insert("R", Slice(HALF, (char *)hrgb, 3*sizeof(half),
00085                 3*xRes*sizeof(half)));
00086         fb.insert("G", Slice(HALF, (char *)hrgb+sizeof(half), 3*sizeof(half),
00087                 3*xRes*sizeof(half)));
00088         fb.insert("B", Slice(HALF, (char *)hrgb+2*sizeof(half), 3*sizeof(half),
00089                 3*xRes*sizeof(half)));
00090         fb.insert("A", Slice(HALF, (char *)ha, sizeof(half), xRes*sizeof(half)));
00091 
00092         OutputFile file(name.c_str(), header);
00093         file.setFrameBuffer(fb);
00094         try {
00095                 file.writePixels(yRes);
00096         }
00097         catch (const std::exception &e) {
00098                 Error("Unable to write image file \"%s\": %s", name.c_str(),
00099                         e.what());
00100         }
00101 
00102         delete[] (hrgb + 3 * (xOffset + yOffset * xRes));
00103         delete[] (ha + (xOffset + yOffset * xRes));
00104 }
